sentences.sContent: When our washing machine broke, our neighbours let us use theirs.
sentences.sCn: 我们的洗衣机坏了的时候，邻居就让我们用他们的。

sentences.sContent: Our house is number 25, and theirs is just opposite.
sentences.sCn: 我们的房子是25号，他们的就在对面。

sentences.sContent: We compared scores and found that theirs were higher than ours.
sentences.sCn: 我们比较了一下，发现他们的得分比我们的高。

trans.tranOther: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with people that have already been mentioned
